agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Elections TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Monday, March 18, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Stephanie Klick HB 362 Israel Relating to the creation of a fund to assist local governments with the acquisition of voting system equipment. HB 529 Miller Relating to renewal of an appointment as a volunteer deputy registrar. HB 1463 González, Jessica Relating to the conduct of primary elections. HB 1691 Rosenthal Relating to compensation for election personnel for a primary election. HB 2132 Klick Relating to the requirement that the comptroller of public accounts receive copies of orders adopted in connection with the administration of elections. HB 2504 Springer Relating to requiring candidates to pay a filing fee or submit a petition in lieu of a filing fee to appear on the ballot for the general election for state and county officers. HB 2909 Klick Relating to election practices and procedures; creating a criminal offense. HB 2910 Klick Relating to the confidentiality of certain personal information of certain persons obtained for the purposes of voting. HB 2911 Klick Relating to voter registration. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
